channel.title: X Logging
channel.description:
Hi im new here and im currently helping a friend fix x logging on his c++ client.
If anyone here knows how to delay the log out time or just plain out fix it posting the code here or emailing me or msn me at austinallen6@yahoo.com
EDIT: X logging is exiting the downloaded client in battle making them disconnect so they do not die. austinallen6@yahoo.com
I would be very grateful if someone will help, thanks, praga[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 08:14:20 pm[/size][hr]BUMP please help someone

item.title: X Logging
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

deadly990:

umah hes saying if their client gets closed… that means that there is no connection to the server. what your saying MAY work but i highly doubt it.

Read full topic

help again please. edited

item.title: X Logging
item.dc:creator: @deadly990 deadly990
item.description:
@deadly990 wrote:

is this just idle logout packets being sent causing the person to log off? if so then you can just have the server not do anything when they are sent. if its something else please clarify what it is by editing your post.
edit: the point of editing your post is so your next post wouldnt just be a useless post. you have therefor made editing your post obsolete. allright now back on topic, i have no idea how to fix this, sorry for wasting your time.

Read full topic
